title: Constructive set theory
summary: Axiomatic constructive set theory is an approach to mathematical constructivism following the program of axiomatic set theory. The same first-order language with " = {\displaystyle =} " and " âˆˆ {\displaystyle \in } " of classical set theory is usually used, so this is not to be confused with a constructive types approach. On the other hand, some constructive theories are indeed motivated by their interpretability in type theories.
